long_description: The Kokatat OutFIT Tour PFD is designed to keep you comfortable during your next on-the-water adventure. Gaia(R) PVC-free foam is soft and flexible, and it won't break down in a wet environment. Durable Cordura(R) nylon shell enhances durability of the Kokatat OuFIT Tour PFD. Adjustable shoulders dial in the perfect fit and Hypalondeg grip panels provide a durable, nonslip surface. Deep-cut neck and arm holes maximize range of motion. Mesh side panels feature 2 adjustable straps to provide the perfect fit; webbing belt with quick-release buckle securely fastens PFD around midsection. 2 front pockets store on-the-water essentials, and hidden interior pocket stores valuables. Rear lash tab is designed to work with a safety strobe (not included); reflective tape increases visibility from the front and back.
short_description: The Kokatat OutFIT Tour PFD is designed to keep you comfortable during your next on-the-water adventure.
